data.description: Converts Perl XS code into C code
data.similar: This replaces the xsubpp from core perl
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The functionality in the 'xsubpp' script has been available only to
    people running the script. This module makes that functionality
    available with a functional interface, allowing use in perl
    environments that have no fork() like MacOS and older Win32
    environments.
